channel.title: Login screen please help =]
channel.description:
hi there,
im helping my mate with his client and im making the client for his source and i was wondering if someone can redirect me to a topic that explains how to make a login screen pop up, like (e.g. when u log in on the screen it says stuff).
thanksyou zanny
p.s. i need asap plz

item.title: Login screen please help =]
item.dc:creator: @xweetok599 xweetok599
item.description:
@xweetok599 wrote:

I don’t think there is a tutorial for that. But if u mean that purple screen, i can give u my code if u don’t use delta and if u use a 317…

Wait…client?

Wrong section, and im sorry that i can’t help you with that then. And still, if you mean that purple screen, that is not client sided, it’s server sided.

Read full topic
